data.name: CreateFederalDebtSetoff
ReadAdministrativeActCertification1
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, TAKEN_DT, ORIGINAL_AMT, CURRENT_AMT, CURRENT_AMT_DT, DECERTIFIED_DT, NOTIFICATION_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TSTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP, ADC_AMT, NON_ADC_AMT, INJURED_SPOUSE_DT, NOTIFIED_BY, DATE_SENT, ETYPE_ADMIN_OFFSET, LOCAL_CODE, SSN, CASE_NUMBER, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, AMOUNT_OWED, TTYPE_ADD_NEW_CASE, CASE_TYPE, TRANSFER_STATE, LOCAL_FOR_TRANSFER, PROCESS_YEAR, TANF_CODE, TTYPE_DELETE_CERT, TTYPE_CHNG_SUB_ST, TTYPE_MODIFY_AMNT, TTYPE_MODIFY_EXCL, TTYPE_STATE_PYMNT, TTYPE_XFER_ADM_RVW, ETYPE_FED_RETRMNT, ETYPE_FED_SALARY, ETYPE_TAX_REFUND, ETYPE_VNDR_PYMNT_M, ETYPE_PSPRT_DENIAL, ETYPE_FIN_INST, RETURN_STATUS, RETURN_STATUS_DATE, DECERTIFY_REASON from CKT_ADMIN_ACT_CERT where (TYPE = 'FDSO') and (CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber) order by TAKEN_DT desc

data.name: ReadAdministrativeActCertification2
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, TAKEN_DT, ORIGINAL_AMT, CURRENT_AMT, CURRENT_AMT_DT, DECERTIFIED_DT, NOTIFICATION_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TSTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP, ADC_AMT, NON_ADC_AMT, INJURED_SPOUSE_DT, NOTIFIED_BY, DATE_SENT, ETYPE_ADMIN_OFFSET, LOCAL_CODE, SSN, CASE_NUMBER, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, AMOUNT_OWED, TTYPE_ADD_NEW_CASE, CASE_TYPE, TRANSFER_STATE, LOCAL_FOR_TRANSFER, PROCESS_YEAR, TANF_CODE, TTYPE_DELETE_CERT, TTYPE_CHNG_SUB_ST, TTYPE_MODIFY_AMNT, TTYPE_MODIFY_EXCL, TTYPE_STATE_PYMNT, TTYPE_XFER_ADM_RVW, ETYPE_FED_RETRMNT, ETYPE_FED_SALARY, ETYPE_TAX_REFUND, ETYPE_VNDR_PYMNT_M, ETYPE_PSPRT_DENIAL, ETYPE_FIN_INST, RETURN_STATUS, RETURN_STATUS_DATE, DECERTIFY_REASON from CKT_ADMIN_ACT_CERT where (TYPE = 'FDSO') and (CASE_NUMBER = @caseNumber) order by TAKEN_DT desc

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: UpdateAdministrativeActCertification
data.value: update CKT_ADMIN_ACT_CERT set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP = @lastUpdTstamp, LAST_NAME = @lastName where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (TYPE = @type) and (TAKEN_DT = @takenDt) and (TANF_CODE = @tanfCode)
